import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { CHeader, CToggler, CHeaderBrand, CHeaderNav, CHeaderNavItem, CHeaderNavLink, CSubheader, CBreadcrumbRouter, CLink } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' // routes config import routes from '../routes' import { TheHeaderDropdown, TheHeaderDropdownMssg, TheHeaderDropdownNotif, TheHeaderDropdownTasks } from './index' const TheHeader = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const sidebarShow = useSelector(state => state.sidebarShow) const toggleSidebar = () => { const val = [true, 'responsive'].includes(sidebarShow) ? false : 'responsive' dispatch({type: 'set', sidebarShow: val}) } const toggleSidebarMobile = () => { const val = [false, 'responsive'].includes(sidebarShow) ? true : 'responsive' dispatch({type: 'set', sidebarShow: val}) } return ( Dashboard Users Settings
 Dashboard  Settings
) } export default TheHeader
